"Let me see here, you're saying that ANY crime I commit against 
either side won't be recorded in any logs?" Phobia thought about the 
possibilities for a moment. Go to the predacons and probably get a 
higher price for his merchandise, and a knife in the back. Or help 
the Maximals, save the transformer race, save Earth, and receive the 
equivilant of diplomatic immunity. (Tough choice.)

"I accept your terms of forgetting my crimes." Taking me back as a 
Maximal is nonnegotiable, I would consider that as an insult. Any 
other terms can be negotiated while your bots unload the materials 
you need." Place my signature into your autoguns so I'm recognized as 
a friend, I'll deliver the merchandise first thing in the morning. 
Phobia out."

His stomach began to shake. he hadn't refueled in quite some 
time."Computer open refueling package." A crate slid forward opening. 
Phobia picked out a piece of rectangular metal and bit down, sucking 
whatever energy was inside.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Klsuter frowns as he recieves Phobia's responce.
> 
> "I'm afraid that's not within my powers," he says into his comm-
link, "We 
> could leave your crimes on the planet....unmentioned, and bring you 
back as a 
> Maximal, but whatever crimes you made before coming to this planet 
are not in 
> my power to pardon."
